job_title: Senior Child Care Worker in London, England
pros: they provide support during lessons and the teachers provide instructions when given coursework for homework
cons: college is boring and lessons are boring too

pros: Some great colleagues across different departments make the job easier to survive.
cons: Too much nepotism and favouritism. Managers are friends of managers or CEO and are promoted to deliver certain control rather than be an educational leaders. A lot of admin involved in teaching job and endless tick-box tasks.

pros: i always shop in primark i think primark is that best
cons: pros and cons. phrase. The pros and cons of something are its advantages and disadvantages, which you consider carefully so that you can make a sensible decision. They sat for hours debating the pros and cons of setting up their own firm. Motherhood has both its pros and cons.

job_title: A Level Tutor in London, England
pros:
Teams come together to overcome adversity.
Solid union presence.
cons:
Oppressive and incompetent management, primarily
Too many 'managers' promoted way beyond their abilities and with a taste of power
If you're in the CEO's jock-strap you'll be looked after - blatant cronyism
Appalling CPD days
Dreadful communication across the group (NCC London wide)
Significant lack of recognition for hard-working staff
No progression opportunities unless the CEO is your pal
Underfunded enrichment and student support activities
Poor advice for students
Very little teaching - mainly about students 'achieving'
Inadequate disciplinary procedures meaning toothless behaviour management policies

review_title: A toxic environment to work in
pros: Highly skilled teachers and support staff.
cons: Too much nepotism and covert racism amongst senior staff. Senior managers are promoted on merit of ‘who you know’ rather than on their abilities in the job. BME staff treated very poorly in particular those from Afro/Caribbean backgrounds.

job_title: ESOL Lecturer & Tutor in London, England
pros: Some of the best training tutors and colleagues to work with
cons: obtaining enough hours as an ESOL tutor
